function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Under-notification of cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Infectious disease outbreaks and epidemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate indoor air quality","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Isolation of the health research community from other sectors may hinder the understanding of climate impacts on public health.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate redundancy in production lines or supply chains may lead to disruptions in crucial product availability during a contagious disease outbreak.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dramatic changes in public and private life due to covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene facilities leading to poor sanitation and disease spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of channels for managers who do not participate in associations or events to access different strategies or experiences.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and interaction promotion in fitness center design","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on existing ontologies and integration of terms from multiple sources may introduce inconsistencies and errors in the cido ontology.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Potential reliance on upper-room germicidal uv guv systems as the primary control measure, leading to neglect of other essential infection control strategies.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global coordination, political challenges","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The adjustment coefficient c_ur for uv-c dose when the virus is suspended in air may be in a range 0.167-0.545.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate waste
